name: Collectors of Fortune
description:
This is the beginnings of a game based around co-optional stealth and thievery, do your best to steal as much as you can while avoiding the security cameras and the homeowner. work together with your partner to fill your van with mountains of valuable goods or hold an uneasy truce to fill the van only to race away with all the money leaving your partner to escape capture alone the choice is yours.  your bag will slowly fill the more loot you collect and you will you need to deposit your loot in the van to go back and collect more.

Player 1 Keyboard Controls:

WSAD movement

E to enter or exit a vehicle

F to grab an item or to deposit your bags contents into the van

Space to jump or drive away or to skip most UI Messages

Player 2 Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Key movement

'/' to enter or exit a vehicle

'.' to grab an item or to deposit your bags contents into the van

right control to jump or drive away or to skip most UI Messages

Xbox 360 controller controls:

left analogue stick for movement

Y button to enter or exit a vehicle

X button to grab an item or to deposit your bags contents into the van

A button to jump or drive away or to skip most UI Messages
